question_text:
Question 49
Which of the following is 
NOT
 a correct statement?
(A) First reading from a level station is a ‘Fore Sight’.
(B) Planimeter is used for measuring ‘area’.
(C) Contours of different elevations may intersect each other in case of an overhanging cliff.
(D) Basic principle of surveying is to work from whole to parts.
